title: Settling
lyrics:
I can't live with you
But I can't live without you
And my hand is on the trigger
Pull it out for you
Mmm

And I can't come to choose what I'm gon' do

And my heart sits quiet if it ain't you

And your love is so sweet

That I'd be a fool, so I guess I'm just settling

Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey



Guess I'm just settling

Ooh, ooh



What I'm gon' do

Why? Cryin' for you

Boy, for you

Hey, hey



What I'm gon' do

When I'm cryin'

Mourning

What I'm gon' do

Cryin' for you

Boy, for you

Hey, hey



What I'm gon' do

When I'm cryin'

Mourning

And I can't take it no more

You, you, you



Cryin'

Mourning

For you

Cryin'

Mourning

For you
